name: first 3d game demo
description: WARNING YOU NEED A GOOD COMPUTER TO DOWNLOAD THIS OR IT WILL BE SLOW. this is my first 3D game. once downloaded and opened it will go into full screen. the only way to exit is to press escape. then you will see options to continue or quit. this only works for computer. use wasd to move, left click to recoil yourself in the opposite direction you are facing.
